TeamID.label: TeamID
TeamID.notProvided: The TeamID field is required but was not provided.
TeamID.invalidType: The TeamID field does not contain valid data. This field must be a numeric value.

Name.label: Name
Name.notProvided: The Name field is required but was not provided.
Name.invalidType: The Name field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
Name.invalidLength: The Name field is too long. This field must be no more than 100 bytes long.

Captain.label: Captain
Captain.invalidType: The Captain field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
Captain.invalidLength: The Captain field is too long. This field must be no more than 100 bytes long.

Color.label: Color
Color.invalidType: The Color field does not contain valid data. This field must be a string value.
Color.invalidLength: The Color field is too long. This field must be no more than 50 bytes long.
